metadata.dcterms:title: Microsatellite data for “Spatial genetic structure of rocky mountain bighorn sheep (Ovis canadensis canadensis) at the northern limit of their native range”.
metadata.dcterms:creator: Deakin, Samuel
metadata.dcterms:description: Microsatellite data for “Spatial genetic structure of rocky mountain bighorn sheep (Ovis canadensis canadensis) at the northern limit of their native range”.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Deakin, S., Gorrell, J.C, Kneteman, J., Hik, D.S., Jobin, R.M., Coltman, D.W. 2020. Spatial genetic structure of Rocky Mountain bighorn sheep (Ovis canadensis canadensis) at the northern limit of their native range. Can. J. Zool. 98(5): 317-330.
